channel.title: Text on Gurudev Ilangovan
channel.description: Recent content in Text on Gurudev Ilangovan

item.title: What your texts say about you
item.description: Introduction Processing Patterns Parsing Analysis Pet words Overall word usage Word usage by member Word usage made better ⌚ 4⃣ 😂😋😍 Popular emojis and chronic roflitis Let’s put a smiley on that face Emoji to word ratio Getting sentient about sentiments Conclusion Introduction Without data, you’re just an another person with an opinion - W. Edwards Deming We all have intuitions, questions or even hypotheses if you will about people’s texting patterns.
